P

Pawn - Class in components
This is the class that creates the pawns of the grid, it does not inherit from the JavaFX Circle class but each object is linked to one
Pawn(int, Box) - Constructor for class components.Pawn
It's The constructor of the class pawn It takes in the name of the pawn as an integer and the box on which the pawn is at the start It then sets the targetRow and the targetColumn accordingly
pl - Static variable in class main.MainActivity
 
Plateau - Class in components
This is the class Plateau that contains most of the information about the game except borders It is created only once in the MainActivity as a static variables as we have only one game going at time
Plateau(int) - Constructor for class components.Plateau
It's the constructor of the Plateau class and contains most of the information about the game except borders It takes as parameters only the number of players
player_turn_label - Static variable in class main.MainActivity
